name: git-flow
description: Git workflow automation with intelligent commit messages and branch management

commands.name: commit
commands.description: Create a commit with auto-generated conventional message

commands.name: commit-push
commands.description: Commit and push to remote in one operation

commands.name: commit-merge
commands.description: Commit current changes and merge into target branch

commands.name: commit-sync
commands.description: Commit, push, and sync with upstream

commands.name: branch-start
commands.description: Start a new feature/fix/chore branch with naming convention

commands.name: branch-cleanup
commands.description: Clean up merged branches locally and optionally remotely

commands.name: git-config
commands.description: Configure git-flow settings for this project

agents.name: git-assistant
agents.description: Git workflow assistant for complex operations

skills.name: workflow-patterns
skills.description: Git branching strategies and workflow patterns
